story_teamplasma_01_01000/2401_1001_0200: Surrender, and give us those Legendary Pokémon!
story_teamplasma_01_01000/2401_1001_0400:
Then we’ll just have to be a little rough and take
them from you.
story_teamplasma_01_01000/2401_1001_0500: What can I do? There must be something...
story_teamplasma_01_01000/2401_1001_0600:
Heh. No matter how hard you try to think your
way out of this, it’s pointless.
story_teamplasma_01_01000/2401_1001_0700: There’s simply no other option but for you to—
story_teamplasma_01_01000/2401_1001_1300:
Team Plasma! They still had a trick up
their sleeve...
story_teamplasma_01_01000/2401_1001_1500:
It seems Ghetsis has some exceptional subordinates
of his own.
